::Shadow Wing::

She was very frightened and felt her fear start to consume her. She 
tried to remain calm, but wasn't very successful. "I..I thank you for 
your help Veratis. But how is it that I can communicate with you and 
not with Lunarpine? I felt his connection, then it was lost. What is 
happening?"


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, cyberwolf4@p... wrote:
> Veratis smiled, he'd achieved communication with a new form.
> 
> "I am Veratis, Lunarpine left you in my care until he returned with 
> some of your old DNA. I'm giving you your life back."
> 
> Outside the link Veratis knew that all favors must one day be 
> returned.
>
